ProductInfo.Features:
Package List: 1). 16 Channel H.264 DVR (2TB hard drive pre-installed); 16). Sony CCD 650 TV Lines Waterproof  4-9mm Lens Varifocal Cameras ; 16). 60ft Video Power Combined Cables ; 2) Power Adapter Units
Support 1channel main output, 1channel SPOT output, 1channel VGA output, 1 Channel HDMI output
Adopts the standard H.264 compression technology, support 16channel recording, Network transmission,and playback simultaneously
Pre-made 60ft Video Power Combined Cables makes installing easy.
1/3'' Sony CCD Cameras provides 650 TV Lines very High resolution image.
ProductInfo.Name: 16 Channel Cctv Security Surveillance Standalone H.264 DVR w/ Hdmi Port, Dvd-rw, 2000gb Hard Drive + 16 X Sony CCD 4-9mm Lens Waterproof Day Night 650 TV Lines Cameras + 16 X 60ft Video Power Cables Complete System
